alert.note: Alert for Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 05 at 1:38PM EDT until April 09 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Michigan, including the following counties, Bay, Midland and Saginaw. * WHEN...Until 400 PM EDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 134 PM EDT, Radar estimates between 2 and 3 inches of rain has fallen over the past 24 hours. - Pockets of light rain will continue through the afternoon, but the heaviest rainfall has ended. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Saginaw, Midland, Bay City, Frankenmuth, Chesaning, Auburn, St. Charles, Birch Run, Pinconning, Coleman, Sanford, Freeland, Kawkawlin, Essexville, Edenville, Zilwaukee, Bentley, Merrill, Oakley and Linwood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
